title: IELTS Writing Practice Test - Complete Example
description: Complete writing test with both tasks demonstrated

sections.title: Writing Task 1
sections.instructions: Spend about 20 minutes on this task

questions.prompt:
The chart below shows the milk export figures from Italy, Russia and Poland from 2008 to 2012.

Summarise the information by selecting and reporting the main features, and make comparisons where relevant.

Write at least 150 words.
questions.instructions: You should spend about 20 minutes on this task.

sections.title: Writing Task 2
sections.instructions: Spend about 40 minutes on this task

questions.prompt:
Some people believe that international media, such as TV, radio and newspapers, have too much influence on the lives of young people today. Others believe that the influence of media is largely positive.

Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.

Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.

Write at least 250 words.
questions.instructions: You should spend about 40 minutes on this task.
